name: pantheon/pcc-for-wordpress
description: Publish WordPress content from Google Docs with Pantheon Content Cloud.

scripts.auth:
@php -r '$argv = $_SERVER["argv"]; $output = []; exec("valet links", $output); $url = $argv[1] ?? false; foreach ($output as $line) { if (str_contains($line, dirname(__DIR__, 3))) { preg_match("/\| (http.*) \|/", $line, $matches); if (isset($matches[1]) && !$url) { $url = explode(" ", $matches[1])[0]; } break; } } if (!$url) { echo "Could not find the URL for the current site directory. Please provide the URL as an argument.
"; exit(1); }if (!isset(parse_url($url)["scheme"])) { $url = "http://{$url}";} putenv("ROUTER_URL=$url/wp-admin/admin.php?page=pcc"); echo "



Forwarding localhost:3030 requests to $url/wp-admin/admin.php?page=pcc.

"; $command = "php -S localhost:3030 local-auth.php"; passthru($command);'
